Theme parks. World's Fairs. Miniature buildings. Stereoscopy. Ebicyclist. Reader of non-fiction, mostly. Science enthusiast. Fountain pen user, letter and postcard writer. Occasional typewriter user. Faux-mail artist. Not remotely religious or spiritual. Cat person. 62 year old fat guy. Sir Blocksalot.

Banner and avatar: an antique lithograph of a chimpanzee in a brown plaid suit and tweed flat cap riding a bicycle.
